programme.desc: Bullet Proof Boobs, Amazing Coincidences, Directional Cows: Cows align with the Earth magnetic fields, and a young makes an incredible connection. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Rematch: Ashley's nemesis Tressa returns to sell the Rolex that got her fired. Insults start to fly and not even Les can stop Ashley leaping over the counter. (S5, ep 5)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The God Particle: Experts question what the God Particle reveals about the origin of our world and whether clues to its significance could have been left by ancient aliens. (S6, ep 16)

programme.desc: Faces of the Gods: Throughout history, there are stories of strange beings unlike anything known to exist on Earth. Could they be more than just mythology?

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay, in 'FarmerBob', and then in 'Gary and Spot', Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal Spot.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar l i Guto, Lili a Benja fynd allan i gasglu coed tn, maen nhw'n sylweddoli bod tri ysbeiliwr am ddwyn y coed. The bunnies find out that three predators are after their firewood.

programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pam mae Pablo'n gweld llun pn-afal, nid yw'n medru meddwl am ddim byd arall! When Pablo sees a picture of a pineapple he gets the taste in his mouth and it won't go away!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn nl mewn hanes i ddarganfod pa fath o beiriannau sydd wedi cael dylanwad mawr ar ein bywydau ni, fel y wasg argraffu. We look at all sorts of machines, from JCB's to Cranes.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae blawd yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach i ddangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Flour comes from.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae Seren yn darganfod papur disglair wedi ei adael yn y parc, ac mae'r Capten yn mynd ar y llithren. Seren finds shiny paper in the park, and the Captain discovers the joys of the slide.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Tra bo Stiw yn mynd i'r acwariwm, mae Elsi'n aros adre' i chwilio am ei hoffi dedi sydd ar goll. Elsi gives up going to the aquarium in order to look for her lost bear.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Seth y ci fferm yn cyfarth byth a hefyd a does neb yn gwybod pam! Seth the dog is barking a lot and nobody knows why! I wonder if Jen and Jim can work out why Seth is barking?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Porth yr Haul yn cael Olwyn Fawr newydd, mae Maer Campus yn eiddigeddus dros ben. When Porth yr Haul gets a new Big Wheel, Mayor Campus is very, very jealous.

programme.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am awyrennau yn y bennod yma, a phwy wnaeth ddyfeisio ac adeiladu'r awyren gyntaf. We'll learn about Aeroplanes in this episode, and about who invented the first one.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Dyfri eisiau ymarfer chwarae'r gm 'Madfall Wedi Fflio' cyn y carnifal. Dyfri wants to practice playing the 'Flying Newts' game before the carnival.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae caws yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddi. Today, Nel wants to know where cheese comes from.

programme.title: Dreigiau: Gwarchodwyr Berc

programme.title: Carlamu

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn llawn clod i deulu'r cor-bwmpen, ac yn 'Wythnos Ymwybyddiaeth Compostio', mae Meinir yn compostio yn null 'bokashi' o Japan. Sioned's busy curating the wild garden in Pont y Twr.

programme.title: Sam Tan

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo'n gweld nad yw ei wy wedi ffrio yn hoff o gael ei chyffwrdd gan ei sbageti! Pablo goes to a caf with his Mum and gets an egg and spaghetti hoops, but his food is upset - oh no!

programme.title: Olobobs

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Chff yn cytuno i fynd am sbin yn y car gyda Crawc ond dim ond os yw e'n cael gyrru. Chiff agrees to accompany Crawc on a day trip out in the car but only if he can drive. Uh-oh.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes dwr ar gyfer injans, a all y dreigiau drwsio pethau heb gael eu stemio! When there's no water for engines, can the dragons fix things without getting steamed up!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Er bod Blero'n hoff iawn o sanau drewllyd, mae traed Talfryn yn achosi problem enfawr. Smelly socks and cheesy feet are good but when it's Talfryn's feet that smell it's a giant problem.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae'r teulu wedi mynd i wersylla, ac mae Deian a Loli'n edrych ymlaen at fwyta malws melys, ond tydi Loli ddim yn rhannu'n deg! Deian and Loli are camping and excited to eat marshmallows!

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gwyneth wedi gweu siwmper i Maldwyn ond ma'r plant yn credu ei fod yn siwtio bwgan brain yn well. Gwyneth has knitted a jumper for Maldwyn but the kids think it better suits scarecrow. [SL]

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr
programme.desc: Tro yma mae Rhys Meirion yn cael cwmni y seren Tik Tok o Bontarddulais, Bronwen Lewis. Social media star Bronwen Lewis joins Rhys Meirion to surprise Dorian, a factory worker in Carmarthen. [SL]

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
programme.desc: Ymunwch Ryland Teifi wrth iddo fynd ar wibdaith gyda'i ferched Lowri a Cifa ar hyd chwe sir yn Iwerddon a Chymru. Ryland Teifi & daughters travel across six counties in Ireland and Wales. [SL]

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Mae Sue ac Emrys yn teithio i Aachen, Yr Almaen, i werthu ebol mewn arwerthiant fawr. Sue & co travel to Aachen, Germany, to sell a foal at one of the world's largest Arabian horse auctions. [SL]

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: 1967. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Barbara Dennek & Rita Maiden. When Monsieur Hulot has to contact a US official in Paris, he gets lost in the complexity of the modern city. [S]

programme.title: The Miracle Of The Bells
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Granting her final request, a Hollywood press agent brings the dead body of an actress back to her hometown for burial. Starring Frank Sinatra & Fred MacMurray. [S]

programme.title: Be My Guest
programme.desc: 1965. Comedy. Directed by Lance Comfort. Stars Steve Marriott, David Hemmings, Andrea Monet. Dave, ex-member of pop group 'The Smart Alecs', meets Erica, an attractive young woman seeking fame. [S]

programme.title: The British Timken Show 1967
programme.desc: Take a nostalgic step back in time and enjoy the spectacular British Timken Show from 1967.

programme.title: The Pointing Finger
programme.desc: 1933. Drama. Directed by George Pearson. Stars John Stuart, Viola Keats & Leslie Perrins. A nobleman, aspiring to becoming an earl, devises an evil scheme to murder his relative. [S]

programme.title: The Wedding Of Lilli Marlene
programme.desc: 1953. War Time Drama. Lilli will not marry her love, an American reporter, until she becomes a star. Starring Lisa Daniely, Hugh McDermott and Sid James. [S]

programme.title: Date With Disaster
programme.desc: 1957. Crime drama directed by Charles Saunders and starring Tom Drake, William Hartnell and Shirely Eaton. One of the two owners of a car business plans to embezzle the company's funds. [S]

programme.title: Song of the Range
programme.desc: 1944. Musical Western. Directed by Wallace Fox. Stars Jimmy Wakely, Dennis Moore, Lee 'Lasses' White. Three cowboys find themselves caught up with government agents and a gold smuggling operation. [S]

programme.title: Beat The Devil
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Director: John Huston. Stars Humphrey Bogart, Gina Lollobrigida & Jennifer Jones. A group of rogues headed to Africa, in hopes of claiming valuable land, get stranded in Italy. [S]

programme.title: The Black Knight
programme.desc: 1954. Adventure. Directed by Tay Garnett. Stars Alan Ladd, Patricia Medina & Peter Cushing. A commoner disguises himself as the black knight to reveal those trying to overthrow King Arthur. [S]

programme.title: The Writing on the Wall
programme.desc: Mike Read continues his journey across Britain to find Blue Plaques. This episode features a host of well-known names including Peter Cushing, Caroline Munro, Arthur Conan Doyle and Oscar Wilde. [S]

programme.title: Cromwell
programme.desc: 1970. Drama. Directed by Ken Hughes. Stars Richard Harris, Alec Guinness & Robert Morley. Politician and soldier, Oliver Cromwell, rises from the ranks to lead a civil war against King Charles I. [S]

programme.title: The Spider and the Fly
programme.desc: 1949. Crime. Directed by Robert Hamer. Stars Eric Portman, Nadia Gray & George Cole. An unusual love triangle develops between two criminals and a policeman on the eve of the first World War. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: UFOs - Pilots/Kaikoura Lights. 1995. Michael Aspel introduces pilots who speak for the first time about UFOs they have seen and UFO sightings on one night in the Kaikoura Peninsula in New Zealand. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro brings you a night of doom, gloom and horror down in the Cellar Club. First up is the intriguing 1971 episode of Doomwatch - In the Dark. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: In the Dark. 1971. Stars John Nolan, Patrick Troughton & Alethea Charlton. A swimmer off the Scottish coast encounters deadly pollution, but the investigation uncovers something far stranger. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Let's continue the night with Caroline Munro as she brings to the table the gruesome horror The Living Dead at Manchester Morgue, also known as Let Sleeping Corpses Lie. [S]

programme.title: The Living Dead at Manchester Morgue
programme.desc: 1974. Horror. Director: Jorge Grau. Stars Cristina Galb & Ray Lovelock. Two travellers arrive in the countryside just in time for the rise of the living dead and the ensuing chaos. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Next week comes the challenge of problem solving and the consequences of superstitious minds, join Caroline Munro for a little taster. [S]

programme.title: Hero of the Hour
programme.desc: 2000. Crime. Directed by David Richards. Stars Ross Kemp, Maggie O'Neill & Julie Armstrong. A security guard becomes a national hero after fending off armed robbers. So why does he feel on edge? [S]

programme.title: Hero of the Hour
programme.desc: 2000. Crime. Directed by David Richards. Stars Ross Kemp, Maggie O'Neill & Julie Armstrong. A security guard becomes a national hero after fending off armed robbers. So why does he feel on edge? [S]

programme.title: Woman in the Dark
programme.desc: 1934. Crime drama. Directed by Phil Rosen. Stars Fay Wray, Ralph Bellamy & Melvyn Douglas. A woman on the run disrupts the peaceful existence of a man recently released from prison. [S]

programme.title: Lady Of Deceit
programme.desc: 1947. Crime Drama. A calculating divorcee risks all by getting involved with a hot-headed murderer. Stars Claire Trevor and Lawrence Tierney. Directed by Robert Wise. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Run Rabbit Run. 1964. Narrated by Niall MacGinnis. Scenes from the beginning of the war in 1940, as the battles begin across Europe. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy VsCrimeInc.
programme.desc: 1941. Action. Directors: John English & William Witney. Stars Ralph Byrd, Michael Owen & Jan Wiley. Dick Tracy goes up against a villain known as The Ghost, who can turn himself invisible.

programme.title: Look At Life High Rise
programme.desc: 1961. An intriguing look at the world of lifts, with a study of the problems faced by engineers to get office workers up to the top of tall buildings.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: Husky Becomes Invisible. 1963. Stars Murray Kash & Libby Morris. Dart is sent to Mars to find the eggs of the Aba bird to help find a cure for a condition known as the floats. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Dead Ringers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Burt Ward. Batman and Robin escape Chandell's trap and plot to outsmart him and put a stop to his malicious plan. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The King's Champion. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, John Bay & Ian Fleming. Led by a pretender to the English throne, a Black Knight issues a challenge that Richard must accept or forfeit his throne. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: The Talisman of Sargon. 1961. Stars David Graham, Graydon Gould & George Murcell. The Supercar team are given the task of stopping Masterspy from getting control of the Talisman of Sargon. [S]

programme.title: Lionheart
programme.desc: Family. 1968. Director: Michael Forlong. Starring: James Forlong, Louise Rush, Ian Jessup, Irene Handl. A lion escapes from a circus but is rescued and protected by a young boy. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Parting Guest. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Patricia Driscoll & Hugh McDermott. Duncan the Scottish Highlander causes problems when he overstays his welcome and becomes infatuated by Marian. [S]

programme.title: The Amazing Transparent Man
programme.desc: 1960. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. Stars Marguerite Chapman, Douglas Kennedy & James Griffith. A crazed scientist invents an invisibility formula, hoping to create an invisible army. [S]

programme.title: A Day Of One's Own 1956
programme.desc: 1956. Directed by Kenneth Fairbairn. A short film about various housewives around the country taking a day off from their traditional domestic chores.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Devil's Laughter. 1959. Starring Patrick Westwood, Alfred Ryder and Ben Wright. The authorities encounter problems when trying to carry out the execution of convicted killer, John Marriott. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: 1875. 1963. Stars David Graham, John Bluthal & Paul Maxwell. Commander Zero, Steve and Venus get the key to Prof. Matic's time machine, but their exploration sends them to a Western town in 1875.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Shadow of Fear. 1968. Stars Paul Maxwell, Sylvia Anderson & Francis Matthews. To learn more about the Mysterons, Spectrum have created a plan to capture detailed images of their home planet, Mars.

programme.title: Trafic
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. Features Marcel Fraval & Honor Bostel. Mr. Hulot travels to Amsterdam to showcase his new camper van and encounters several hurdles on the way. [S]

programme.title: Web of Suspicion
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Directed by Max Varnel. Stars Philip Friend & Susan Beaumont. When a teacher is wrongly accused of murdering a pupil, he must clear his name and save the school from another tragedy. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Guilt. 1977. Stars Douglas Fielding & James Ellis. Quilley was at school with Chris Murray and knows he wouldn't hurt a soul, so when Chris pleads guilty to a savage assault, he wants to know why. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1970. If It's Got Your Number On It. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. Freda begins an alliance with an Australian airman only to be discovered by an old flame. [S]

programme.title: Rebecca
programme.desc: 1940. Mystery. Directed by Alfred Hitchcock and starring Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine and George Sanders. A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife. [S]

programme.title: The People That Time Forgot
programme.desc: 1977. Adventure. Directed by Kevin Connor. Stars Patrick Wayne, Doug McClure & Sarah Douglas. An expedition in search of a lost colleague stumbles upon a prehistoric world hidden in the Arctic. [S]
